title: [Glittering Sands]
description: Heavy velvet curtains have been hung over the windows and open doorway in an attempt to conserve what is left of the crumbling walls.  Large amounts of sand have infiltrated the neglected structure, covering the entirety of the floor.  A splintered door has been lodged into one of the more sizeable dunes creating a makeshift table.  Stray beams of light filter in through cracks in the ceiling illuminating the wares that have been displayed on a frayed net.
